text: Ceroplesis aestuans is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Olivier in 1795. It is known from Benin, Eritrea, Cameroon, Senegal, Morocco, Togo, and Uganda.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis aestuans. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==Subspecies== * Ceroplesis aestuans aestuans (Olivier, 1795) * Ceroplesis aestuans guineensis Hintz, 1920 ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1795
title: Ceroplesis aestuans
